section.p: A strange ship emerges from the fog bank. It is barely seaworthy, a floating wreck with rotting rigging, and mouldy timbers. But it is the nature of the crew that draws your attention - ghostly forms, undead pirates, spectral figures that leap and dance, wielding rusty cutlasses. A tattered red pennant flies from the mast.
Your crew is filled with dread. ‘Ye gods,’ wails the first mate. ‘It’s a ghost ship - if they catch us, they’ll take our souls down into the cold, dark deeps!’
The spectral ship surges towards you in silent pursuit as the hot sun beats down.
